content.text:
# King's Creek (Texas)

'''King's Creek''' is a creek in Rockwall and Kaufman counties in Texas.
Course
King's Creek flows from central Rockwall County south past US 80, Iâ€”20, US 175, and SH 274 into Cedar Creek Lake, a reservoir near Kemp.
Before being dammed, it flowed into Cedar Creek, which is a tributary of the Trinity River.
References
See also
*List of rivers of Texas
